items.title: Match of the Day
items.summary: Mark Chapman presents highlights of Aston Villa v Manchester United.

items.title: Man City to weigh players before Forest game
items.summary: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says his players will be weighed when they return to training to check they are fit enough to play against Nottingham Forest.

items.title: 'Feyenoord heeft er baat bij dat het project Van Persie slaagt'
items.summary: Feyenoord is erbij gebaat dat het project met Robin van Persie als trainer slaagt, zo denkt Pierre van Hooijdonk. De analyticus snapt daarom dat de trainer wat meer tijd krijgt bij de Rotterdammers. Als het aan Wim Kieft zou liggen, dan zou Feyenoord Van Persie ook moeten houden als trainer.

items.title: Antony sluit het jaar af met weer een belangrijke rol bij zege Real Betis
items.summary: Naast de duels van PSV en Feyenoord die we in een apart liveblog volgen, staan er nog drie Eredivisie-duels op het programma. Daarnaast wordt er ook volop gevoetbald in het buitenland. In deze VI Live blijf je daarvan volledig op de hoogte.

items.title: Salah-Eddine straalt na zege Marokko: 'Beleven het alsof je leven ervan afhangt'
items.summary: Anass Salah-Eddine heeft een succesvol debuut beleefd bij Marokko. In het openingsduel met de Comoren werd met 2-0 gewonnen en gaf de PSV‚Äôer een assist bij een weergaloze omhaal van Ayoub El Kaabi.

items.title: 'Saibari kan het niveau van Tottenham Hotspur of Bayern M√ºnchen aan'
items.summary: Ismael Saibari heeft met Marokko een zakelijke zege geboekt in het openingsduel van de Afrika Cup. De PSV‚Äôer werd vooraf al bestempeld als een potenti√´le speler van het toernooi, maar kwam tegen de Comoren nog niet volledig uit de verf.

items.title: Liverpool fear Alexander Isak has fractured leg after horror injury against Spurs
items.summary: Striker hurt by Van de Ven tackle when opening scoring MRI scan results to reveal length of spell on sidelines Liverpool fear their record signing Alexander Isak has fractured his left leg and will face months on the sidelines. The league champions are waiting on the results of an MRI scan after the ¬£125m man was injured against Tottenham in Saturday‚Äôs Premier League game. The 26-year-old sustained the problem while scoring the opener against Spurs ‚Äì his second league goal of an already injury-hit debut season ‚Äì in the 2-1 win after defender Micky van de Ven slid across and caught his leg as the striker planted it on the ground. Continue reading...

items.title: VI Kerstnummer 2025: 'Leer te dansen in de regen'
items.summary: Als Rob Jetten binnen afzienbare tijd daadwerkelijk aantreedt als volgende premier van Nederland, zal zijn vader Anton apetrots zijn. Tegelijk zal de grote voetballiefhebber zich altijd blijven afvragen hoe ver de snelle rechtsback van UDI ‚Äô19 het zou hebben geschopt als hij er niet ineens de brui aan had gegeven als B-junior. Een scout van NEC had hem net in het vizier gekregen‚Ä¶ ‚ÄòOf ik hem niet had kunnen overhalen om toch door te gaan met voetballen? Dat hoefde je bij Rob echt niet te proberen.‚Äô

items.title: 'Fighter' Rogers shows importance as Villa stay in title race
items.summary: Morgan Rogers shows his importance to Aston Villa with two goals in a win over Manchester United, as Unai Emery's side remain in the title hunt.

items.title: El Kaabi‚Äôs stunning strike caps Morocco‚Äôs win over Comoros in Afcon opener
items.summary: The Africa Cup of Nations hosts, Morocco, overcame a nervy start to beat Comoros in the tournament‚Äôs opening game on Sunday after Brahim D√≠az and the substitute Ayoub El Kaabi scored second-half goals. It was a far from convincing showing, however, from highly fancied Morocco who are 97 places above the small Indian Ocean island nation in the world rankings and had to toil hard for the points in the rain at Rabat‚Äôs Prince Moulay Abdellah stadium. Continue reading...

items.title: Nev: Man Utd can build on this week - but Keane blasts 'corner cutting' defending
items.summary: Gary Neville feels Ruben Amorim has given himself a blueprint to move forward after a notable change in style this week - but Roy Keane remains unimpressed with "one of the worst teams in the league" without the ball.

items.title: Kane smashes Arjen Robben record in Bayern rout
items.summary: Harry Kane scored his 30th club goal of the season as Bayern Munich shrugged off an injury and illness crisis to sweep past Heidenheim 4-0 on Sunday and go into the Bundesliga's winter break with a nine-point lead.

items.title: United's Fernandes out a 'while' with injury blow
items.summary: Manchester United's Bruno Fernandes was substituted at halftime of the team's Premier League clash against Aston Villa with an apparent hamstring issue.

items.title: Hosts Morocco seal AFCON opener on stellar goal
items.summary: Brahim Diaz's opener and a stunning Ayoub El Kaabi overhead kick saw AFCON hosts Morocco defeat Comoros 2-0 in the tournament opener on Sunday.

items.title: Chaos! Ally Pally goes wild for Littler's 'fake' big fish and Davies walks off early!
items.summary: Watch a funny 60 seconds between Luke Littler and David Davies as we have a fake 170 checkout and premature walk off!

items.title: Man Utd face up to 'massive' loss of injured Fernandes
items.summary: Manchester United's injury problems worsened as captain and talisman Bruno Fernandes was replaced in a 2-1 defeat by Aston Villa.

items.title: Man United's issues laid bare while Aston Villa enter title race with gritty win
items.summary: Problems are mounting for Man United after Sunday's defeat, a result that vaulted Aston Villa into the Premier League title race.

items.title: Premier League recap, reaction: Rogers fires Aston Villa to big win vs. Man United
items.summary: With the win, Aston Villa is now seven points clear of fourth-place Chelsea in the title race.

items.title: Amorim warns against panic buying after Fernandes joins Manchester United injury list
items.summary: Captain Fernandes injured in defeat at Aston Villa ‚ÄòWe need to find solutions, we continue with our plan‚Äô Ruben Amorim insisted Manchester United risk making mistakes in the January transfer window if they panic after Bruno Fernandes joined their growing injury list. Amorim said he expects the United captain to miss their home Boxing Day game against Newcastle and fears Fernandes will be sidelined ‚Äúfor a while‚Äù after being forced off at half-time in the defeat against Aston Villa. Fernandes clutched his left calf after a sixth-minute tackle from Boubacar Kamara and was later fouled by another Villa midfielder, Amadou Onana. He was replaced by Lisandro Mart√≠nez at the interval. The Argentina centre-back played alongside Manuel Ugarte at the base of United‚Äôs midfield, with Kobbie Mainoo absent with a calf issue sustained in training on Saturday. Continue reading...

items.title: Stunning Rogers double secures Villa win over Man Utd
items.summary: Morgan Rogers scores twice for Aston Villa in their 2-1 win against Manchester United, extending Villa's unbeaten run to 10 matches in all competitions.
